thought: The Slack API call in mainWorkflow is failing due to missing 'messages' or 'blocksUi' parameter. The slack_params currently only have 'select', 'channelId', and 'messageType' but no message content. We need to add 'blocksUi' with a Slack block containing the message text, matching the working Slack action_2 parameters.
plan: Update slack_params in mainWorkflow to include 'blocksUi' parameter with a Slack block containing the message text
Set 'messageType' to 'block' to match blocksUi usage
Test Slack sending again after update
